name: TechnoRun
description: An infinite runner made in under less than 24 hours, half of which was spent on obsessive playtesting. Run through a randomly generated cityscape, avoiding spikes and pits and collecting coins. Every once in a while, the game speeds up slightly, letting you jump over longer pits and spiketraps but giving you less time to react to obstacles. Saves your highscore - challenge yourself to be the very best!
